name: KabobRocks-PirateGame
description:
Pirate Adventure - The Cave of Secrets

--------------------------------------------------------------

Journey with Cap'n Plank as he explores the Cave of Secrets in search of the legendary treasure of the deceased pirate Cap'n Skellybones and his crew.

By finding the secrets held by the mates of Skellybones' crew, Plank will discover a loot, greater than he can imagine.

Controls

--------------------------------------------------------------

Arrow keys to move.

Space to Jump.

"i" to close message prompts.

"q" to end game at prompt.
